placeholders.HERO_HEADING_TEXT: Introducing Kitten Mittens: Pawsitively Adorable Protection
placeholders.HERO_SUBHEADING_TEXT: Keep your feline friend's paws cozy and your furniture scratch-free with our stylish and comfortable kitten mittens.
placeholders.FOOTER_TEXT: © 2023 Purrfect Paws. All rights reserved. Bringing warmth to tiny toes, one mitten at a time.
